item.title: Words and sentences: parts of the body
item.summary: Words in the Katkop dialect, from ≠kásin (B XXV. 2355-2360), from !kwéiten ta ||ken (L VI.-1. 3882, 3859-3897), and from Dia!kwãin (L V.-6. 4434 and 4435, 8. 4615 rev., 9. 4653 rev., etc.). |xam words, given by !kweiten ta ||ken, for parts of the body.
item.comments: 1) 'Dictated by !kweiten ta ||ken or Rachel, a Bushman woman, and the wife of ≠ka ssin or Klaas Katkop' (found written on the page opposite the Contents page of the notebook), 2) The page numbers in this book (VI-1) are duplicates of those in notebook IV-4, 3) This story is found in Book VI-1
item.author: !kweiten ta ||ken (Rachel) (VI)
